item.title: Beshear takes on national role as Dems eye governors to get to the White House
item.description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear is leading the Democratic Governors Association for the 2026 midterms, with fellow potential presidential candidate Michiga...

item.title: 11/3: CBS Morning News
item.description: Government shutdown enters Day 34; Affordability and economy top concerns for voters ahead of Election Day.

item.title: Here's where minimum wage increases are set to kick in next year
item.description: Minimum wages are set to rise in 22 U.S. states and 66 cities and counties next year, even as the federal baseline wage remains at $7.25.

item.title: Hitmen ambush and kill journalist who covered corruption
item.description: Fernando Nunezwas shot and killed by hitmen while returning from an assignment and his brother was critically injured, the ANP said.

item.title: Car bomb kills 5 people, including 3 officers, in front of police station
item.description: The explosion was so powerful that human remains were scattered throughout the area, police said.
